data.title: 2007 web archives – The American French Film Festival in Los Angeles
data.text:
FILMS

Bad Faith (Mauvaise foi)

Directed by: Roschdy Zem

Written by: Pascal Elbé, Roschdy Zem

West Coast Premiere

Change of Address (Changement d’adresse)

Written & directed by: Emmanuel Mouret

Los Angeles Premiere

Could This Be Love? (Je crois que je l’aime)

Directed by: Pierre Jolivet

Written by: Pierre Jolivet, Simon Michaël

US Premiere

Counter Investigation (Contre-enquête)

Written & directed by: Franck Mancuso

North American Premiere

Fair Play

Written & directed by: Lionel Bailliu

Los Angeles Premiere

Family Hero (Le Héros de la famille)

Directed by: Thierry Klifa

Written by: Thierry Klifa, Christopher Thompson

West Coast Premiere

Flanders (Flandres)

Written & directed by: Bruno Dumont

West Coast Premiere

The General Store (Alimentation générale)

Written & directed by: Chantal Briet

West Coast Premiere

Hunting and Gathering (Ensemble, c’est tout)

Written & directed by: Claude Berri

North American Premiere

La Vie en Rose (La Mome)

Written & directed by: Olivier Dahan

Los Angeles Premiere

Mon Colonel

Directed by: Laurent Herbiet

Written by: Costa-Gavras, Jean-Claude Grumberg

US Premiere

Michou d’Auber

Directed by: Thomas Gilou

Written by: Thomas Gilou, Messaoud Hattou

US Premiere

On Fire (&ccedila brûle)

Directed by: Claire Simon

Written by: Jérôme Beaujour, Claire Simon, Nadège Trébal

West Coast Premiere

Paris, je t’aime

A collection of shorts from world-acclaimed writers/directors

Produced by: Emmanuel Benbihy, Claudie Ossard

West Coast Premiere

Priceless (Hors de prix)

Directed by: Pierre Salvadori

Written by: Benoît Graffin, Pierre Salvadori

US Premiere

The Right of the Weakest (La Raison du plus faible)

Written & directed by: Lucas Belvaux

US Premiere

The Singer (Quand j’étais chanteur)

Written & directed by: Xavier Giannoli

West Coast Premiere

The Snake (Le Serpent)

Directed by: Eric Barbier

Written by: Eric Barbier, Trân-Minh Nam

North American Premiere

Tell No One (Ne le dis à personne)

Directed by: Guillaume Canet

Written by: Guillaume Canet, Philippe Lefebvre

West Coast Premiere

Twice Upon A Time

Directed by: Antoine de Caunes

Written by: Antoine de Caunes, Jeanne Le Guillou, Peter Stuart

Los Angeles Premiere
